data.text: @nacenationunite Sorry to hear this, I caught it in Dec … unpleasant experience even if I was lucky to have mild symptoms. Best thing is to drink lots of water/isotonic drinks, lots of vitamins/meds and sleep as much as you can (lethargy can really kick in, and also to avoid long term symptoms).
@nacenationunite My cousin said fluids and sleep was all she needed
@nacenationunite Feel better soon, both of you 💜
@nacenationunite I’m sorry. I hope you have a quick recovery from it
@beIImorIeys Thank you! I have tons of vitamin C, but I’ll add zinc to my list too 💗
@nacenationunite Yes I agree with the rest ! Vitamin C & Zinc and absolutely vitamin D ! Can help. Wish you best & so sorry that you have covid 😩feel better soon🥺❤️🙏
@nacenationunite I took vitamin c every day, and my mom said taking that and zinc every day helped her feel a lot better! Hope you both feel better soon
@grangersdraco Yes that would mean we’re almost there!!! 💗
